Uses of Package
org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util

  • Packages that use org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util 
    Package Description
    org.apache.fop.complexscripts.fonts  
    org.apache.fop.complexscripts.scripts  
    org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util  
    org.apache.fop.fonts
    Classes for font handling.
  • Classes in org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util used by org.apache.fop.complexscripts.fonts 
    Class and Description
    CharAssociation
    A structure class encapsulating an interval of characters expressed as an offset and count of Unicode scalar values (in an IntBuffer).
    GlyphContextTester
    Interface for testing the originating (source) character context of a glyph sequence.
    GlyphSequence
    A GlyphSequence encapsulates a sequence of character codes, a sequence of glyph codes, and a sequence of character associations, where, for each glyph in the sequence of glyph codes, there is a corresponding character association.
    GlyphTester
    Interface for testing glyph properties according to glyph identifier.
    ScriptContextTester
    Interface for providing script specific context testers.
  • Classes in org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util used by org.apache.fop.complexscripts.scripts 
    Class and Description
    GlyphSequence
    A GlyphSequence encapsulates a sequence of character codes, a sequence of glyph codes, and a sequence of character associations, where, for each glyph in the sequence of glyph codes, there is a corresponding character association.
    ScriptContextTester
    Interface for providing script specific context testers.
  • Classes in org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util used by org.apache.fop.complexscripts.util 
    Class and Description
    CharAssociation
    A structure class encapsulating an interval of characters expressed as an offset and count of Unicode scalar values (in an IntBuffer).
    GlyphContextTester
    Interface for testing the originating (source) character context of a glyph sequence.
    GlyphSequence

    Class and Description
